mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum , A.* FROM ( SELECT JSPUSER.* FROM JSPUSER ORDER BY USERID)A) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{page}*#{pageSize}-(#{pageSize}-1) AND #{page}*#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into jspuser (userId, name ,pass , addr1 , addr2, zipcd , email, tel , birth, profile) values(#{userId},#{ name },#{pass },#{ addr1 },#{ addr2},#{ zipcd },#{ email},#{ tel },#{ birth},#{profile,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
